column4: it seems quite impossible to install wlan without having internet first? considering you need to install wireless-tools? or am I wrong?
I think that stuff is on the cd, emphasis on "think"
okey. Will I need to change anything in the synaptic to install from cd, or will it be installed? If you may guess? :)
inserting the cd should prompt you to add the cd as a repo, if it isn't already.  If it doesn't, just use edit > add cd rom repository....  in synaptic
